description: Send fragmented binary message message with message payload of length 4 * 2**20 (4M). Sent out in fragments of 4M.
expectation: Receive echo'ed binary message (with payload as sent).
httpRequest:
GET / HTTP/1.1
User-Agent: AutobahnTestSuite/0.7.5-0.10.9
Host: 127.0.0.1:6000
Upgrade: WebSocket
Connection: Upgrade
Pragma: no-cache
Cache-Control: no-cache
Sec-WebSocket-Key: ORcVuq/iponxvb+Mrh0YOQ==
Sec-WebSocket-Version: 13
httpResponse:
HTTP/1.1 101 Switching Protocols
Upgrade: websocket
Sec-WebSocket-Key: ORcVuq/iponxvb+Mrh0YOQ==
Sec-WebSocket-Accept: iylwFMAwHN8B7/Z27Bt4GmSkCqg=
Server: async_echo_server
Connection: Upgrade
Content-Length: 0
localCloseReason: received non-continuation data frame while inside fragmented message
result: Did not receive message within 100 seconds.
resultClose: The spec requires the connection to be failed cleanly here
